A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Script writing terrible
Visually good
Cast selection poor
Cringed at far to much 
Could of walked out happily 
Good story poor execution 
The cgi characters like the dogs and at the casino looked like a men in black movie.
Was hoping for a darker Luke not comedy like yoda.
Things blow up far to easy again!!
Sold all my Star Wars memorabilia because I felt it was embarrassing to be linked with this rubbish.
Forget how good Harrison ford was without him.

Half a star isn't unfair it was on par with home alone 3
